game.name: Fix-It Felix Jr.
game.desc: Fix-It Felix Jr. brings the charm of classic arcade games to the C64. As Felix, you use your magic hammer to repair the windows wrecked by Wreck-It Ralph on a high-rise building. While hopping from windowsill to windowsill, you must dodge falling bricks and later survive ducks and barriers. Picking up pies grants short-term invincibility. Levels don't loop but grow harder endlessly â€“ pure arcade spirit with retro flair.
